result.execSummary:
The defendant Raymond A Delaney was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 30 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Intent     Return to sender - Not deliverable as addressed; Unable to forward

ADDRESS INFO for Raymond A Delaney
Current: 102 Bluebird Lane #7, Knapp, WI 54749 United States  (Effective: 02-12-2016)
Prior: 2340 Howe St #3, Mount Pleasant, WI 53403

Defendant Raymond A Delaney in court with attorney Keith David O'Donnell.  Jennifer Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Nancy Szeklinski.
State moves to amend Ct. 1 to Misd PTHC.
Plea:  Cts. 1&2 w/o RO - G.
BTC:  Cts. 1&2 - GUILTY.  Cts. 3&4 - DRI.
$100 +CC+DNA surcharge, each count, pp $50/mo beg 5-1-16, ftp 30 days RCJ for contempt.

Defendant Raymond A Delaney in court with attorney Keith David O'Donnell.  Jennifer C. Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.
Def req PLEAS.
BTC:  Amend bond to include 5 mtgs/wk.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 12, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

**AMENDED 12-7-2015:    Defendant must attend 5 self-help meetings per week and provide signed proof of attendance.**

Defense and State stipulate to bond modification. 
BTC: Bond modification is granted. Bond is modified to a $500.00 cash  bond. Same conditions apply.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 14, 2015 at 08:15 am.
